text: Denis Goavec (born 15 September 1957) is a retired French football midfielder and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== ==External links== * Denis Goavec Interview Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Toulon Category:French footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Stade Brestois 29 players Category:FC Montceau Bourgogne players Category:Stade Briochin players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:French football managers Category:Stade Brestois 29 managers Category:Angers SCO managers Category:Vannes OC managers Category:Stade de Reims managers Category:Benin national football team managers Category:MC El Eulma managers Category:JS Saoura managers Category:French expatriate football managers Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Benin Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Algeria Category:Expatriate football managers in Benin Category:Expatriate football managers in Algeria
